headline: Paramount, Comcast, Netflix Prepare Bids for Warner as Deadline Approaches

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery just got a boost, and buyers are circling
summary: Investors did not see this coming, but Warner Bros. Discovery just started a new chapter. For a long time, the media behemoth was seen as a recovery story based on streaming and studio expansion. Now, it is at the heart of what may be the greatest entertainment shakeup of the year. headline: Disney stock falls 8% as media giant posts mixed results
summary: Disney reported fiscal fourth-quarter results before the bell Thursday, giving its final update on streaming subscriber metrics.
